statements.select:
SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY CC.name, AA.name) as RowNo , AA.ID , AA.CreatedOn , AA.CreatedBy , AA.CreatedByName , AA.UpdatedOn , AA.UpdatedBy , AA.UpdatedByName
, AA.uid , AA.name , AA.manager , AA.showroom , AA.agency_uid , AA.caption , AA.image , AA.image_width , AA.image_height
, CC.name as agency_name , U1.name as manager_name , U2.name as showroom_name
, AA.ApiRequestID , M3.Name as ApiType , M4.Name as Status , BB.RequestDate
FROM IKScrap.dbo.TSmapsBrand AA WITH (NOLOCK) LEFT JOIN IKScrap.dbo.TApiRequest BB WITH (NOLOCK) ON AA.ApiRequestID = BB.ID LEFT JOIN IKScrap.dbo.TSmapsAgency CC WITH (NOLOCK) ON AA.agency_uid = CC.uid LEFT JOIN IKScrap.dbo.TSmapsUser U1 WITH (NOLOCK) ON AA.manager = U1.uid LEFT JOIN IKScrap.dbo.TSmapsUser U2 WITH (NOLOCK) ON AA.showroom = U2.uid LEFT JOIN IKBase.dbo.TCode M3 WITH (NOLOCK) ON BB.ApiType = M3.Code AND M3.ParentCode = 'ApiType' LEFT JOIN IKBase.dbo.TCode M4 WITH (NOLOCK) ON BB.Status = M4.Code AND M4.ParentCode = 'ApiStatus' WHERE 1=1
AND AA.RequestID = #RequestID#
AND AA.agency_uid = #AgencyUid#
AND ( AA.name LIKE '%'+#FindText#+'%' )
ORDER BY RowNo
SELECT * FROM IKScrap.dbo.TSmapsBrand AA WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE AA.ID = #ID#
SELECT * FROM IKScrap.dbo.TSmapsBrand AA WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE AA.uid = #uid#
statements.insert:
INSERT INTO dbo.TSmapsBrand ( CreatedOn, CreatedBy, CreatedByName, ApiRequestID, uid, name, manager, showroom, agency_uid, caption, image, image_width, image_height ) VALUES ( GetDate(), #CreatedBy#, #CreatedByName#, #ApiRequestID#, #uid#, #name#, #manager#, #showroom#, #agency_uid#, #caption#, #image#, #image_width#, #image_height# )
SELECT @@IDENTITY AS ID
statements.update:
UPDATE IKScrap.dbo.TSmapsBrand SET UpdatedOn = GetDate() , UpdatedBy = #UpdatedBy# , UpdatedByName = #UpdatedByName#
, ApiRequestID = #ApiRequestID# , uid = #uid# , name = #name# , manager = #manager# , showroom = #showroom# , agency_uid = #agency_uid# , caption = #caption# , image = #image# , image_width = #image_width# , image_height = #image_height# WHERE ID = #ID#
